The '''Spider domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters [[spider]]-themed [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: A priest with this domain gained the ability to rebuke and command spiders much as an evil [[cleric]] rebuked and commanded [[undead]].
document_data.Spells: At first, a priest with this domain could use  ''[[spider climb]]'' to walk on walls and ceilings. As they advanced, they could summon swarms of spiders to attack at their command with ''[[summon swarm]]'', ''[[insect plague]]'', and ''[[creeping doom]]''. They could also create a spider mount with ''[[phantom steed]]''; enlarge spiders, [[centipede]]s, and [[scorpion]]s with ''[[giant vermin]]''; and turn rocks into spiders ''[[stone spiders]]''. Finally, they could forcibly transform other people into spiders, with ''[[spider curse]]'' turning another being into an obedient [[drider]]-like creature, and ''[[spider shapes]]'' turning multiple willing beings into [[monstrous spider]]s.
